Please ensure I have `VIEW_CHANNEL`, `SEND_MESSAGES`, `MANAGE_MESSAGES`, `MENTION_EVERYONE`, and `EMBED_LINKS` permissions in that channel!

singular.missingPermsPrecheck.question:
I do not have sufficient permissions to publish this action to {{channel|1}}!
Do you want to continue anyway?
singular.missingPermsPrecheck.yes.response: Alrighty, then, if you say so!
singular.nino.help:
Some helpful tips:
- You need to be an administrator to create new projects
- Only the assigned staff member and the project owner can mark tasks complete
- Additional staff can be added to individual episodes for one-off tasks
- If odd episode numbers are needed (episode 0, episode 7.5, etc) use `/episode add`
- If you need additional assistance, contact 9volt.
- Full documentation: https://github.com/9vult/nino/blob/master/docs/docs.md
singular.progress.bulk:
I see you've been busy.
**{{taskName|1}}** for episodes {{start_episode|2}} through {{end_episode|3}} have been updated.
singular.progress.done.inTheDust:
Команда ещё работает над серией **{{currentEpisode|1}}**, но твоя задача в ней уже выполнена.
**{{taskName|2}}** дальше требуется в серии **{{nextEpisode|3}}**; хочешь, я поставлю отметку в ней?
singular.progress.done.inTheDust.dontDoIt: Ладно, тогда я ничего не трогаю.
singular.progress.done.inTheDust.question: Что мне следует сделать?
singular.progress.done.inTheDust.timeout: Я прождала целую минуту, но так и не услышала, чего ты хочешь!
singular.progress.projectComplete:
**{{title|1}}** is complete.
Great job to everyone involved!
singular.progress.skipped:
**{{taskName|1}}** серии {{episode|2}} пропускаем.
Если всё ж решишь сделать, то сначала запусти `/undone`.
singular.progress.undone: **{{taskName|2}}** серии {{episode|1}} всё-таки, значит, ещё надо доделать.
singular.project.conga.added: I added {{current|1}} → {{next|2}} to the Conga line for you.
singular.project.conga.empty: There is nobody doing the Conga for this project.
singular.project.conga.removed: I removed {{current|1}} → {{next|2}} from the Conga line for you.
singular.project.conga.union.added.current:
I added {{current|1}} → {{next|2}} to the Conga line for you.
There is now a union: {{union|3}} → {{next|4}}
singular.project.conga.union.added.next:
I added {{current|1}} → {{next|2}} to the Conga line for you.
There is now a union: {{current|3}} → {{union|4}}
singular.project.created:
I created project `{{nickname|1}}` for you. You may want to consider the following:
1. `/keystaff add` to add positions
2. `/keystaff setweight` to re-order positions
3. `/project edit`: `AniList` to set airing date/times, and `/airreminder enable` to get airing notifications.
singular.project.server.transferred: Moved `{{project|1}}` to this server. Good luck!
singular.server.admin.added: Added {{staff|1}} as an administrator for this server.
singular.server.admin.removed: I removed {{staff|1}}'s administrator privileges from this server.
